description.p: Crystalline beings with natural armor and resistance to toxins, Gemborn are a race of sentient gem-like humanoids.
As a Gemborn, you have the following racial traits.
Crystalline Heart. You have Resistance to Poison damage. You also have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Poisoned and Petrified conditions.
Crystal Clarity. You have Advantage on Intelligence checks regarding gems and crystals.

Natural Armor. Your naturally hard body provides you a base AC of 15 (your Dexterity modifier doesn't affect this number). You can't wear light, medium, or heavy armor, but if you are using a shield, you can apply the shield's bonus as normal.
Pouch of Crystal Dust. A small pouch containing powdered crystal that can be used for various purposes. You can use this pouch to cast Prestidigitation by sprinkling dust.
Subrace. Six main subraces of Gemborn exist: Amethyst, Diamond, Emerald, Sapphire, Ruby, and Rose Quartz. Choose one of these subraces.

description.p: Rose Quartz Gemborn are empathic, soothing presences with protective abilities.
Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Natural Armor. Increase your Natural armor from 15 to 16.
Empathic Sense. You have advantage on Persuasion and Insight checks to discern emotions.
Soothing Presence. Once per long rest you may use your Pouch of Crystal Dust to cast the Sanctuary spell.
Aura of Tranquility. You and every creature of your choice within 5 feet of you have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Charmed and Frightened conditions.

Bastion of Hope. As an action, you may roll a number of d6s equal to half your Proficiency Bonus. You and each creature of your choice within 30 feet of you gain Temporary Hit Points equal to the total rolled. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest.
Cantrips. You know the Spare the Dying and Light cantrips.
You have advantage on Persuasion and Insight checks to discern emotions.

description.p: Diamond Gemborn possess incredible durability and can emit dazzling light.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Natural Armor. Increase your Natural armor from 15 to 18.

Inner Light. As a Bonus Action you may choose to emit bright light in a 15-foot radius for 1 minute. The light is sunlight. You may use this action a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus and regain all uses when you finish a long rest.

Diamond Aura. When your inner light is active and a creature attempts to make an attack while within that light, you may use your reaction to intensify your inner light forcing the creature to attack with Disadvantage. A creature immune to the Blinded condition is not affected by this feature.
Cantrips. You know the Thaumaturgy and Sword Burst cantrips.

description.p: Emerald Gemborn share a deep connection with nature and possess healing abilities.
Ability Score Increase. Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
Natural Armor. Increase your Natural armor from 15 to 16.
Nature's Whisperer. Once per short or long rest you may use your Pouch of Crystal Dust to cast the Speak With Plants spell.

Rejuvenation. As an action, you may choose one creature within 30 feet of you and create a magical bond between the two of you. This bond lasts for one minute so long as that creature remains within 30 feet of you and you maintain concentration (as if you were concentrating on a spell). While the bond is active, at the start of your turn you take 1d6 Necrotic damage and the other creature heals twice the amount of damage you take. This Necrotic damage cannot be reduced by any means. You may use this feature a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus. You regain expended uses at the end of a Long Rest.
One With Nature. When in a forest, you leave no tracks and can automatically discern true north. Furthermore, you can attempt to hide even when only lightly obscured by natural phenomena.
Cantrips. You know the Druidcraft and Thorn Whip cantrips.
Once per short or long rest you may use your Pouch of Crystal Dust to cast the Speak With Plants spell.

description.p: Crystallian is not a language of words, but of pure tonal resonance. It is a complex system of precisely calibrated frequencies, akin to the harmonious vibrations of countless tuning forks. Gemborn communicate by manipulating the crystalline structures within their bodies, producing a symphony of clear, ringing tones. Each distinct frequency, and the intricate patterns they form, carries meaning, conveying emotions, concepts, and even magical intent without the need for traditional words.
